thread.title: Asia Consumer Spending Won’t Come to Rescue
thread.title_full: Asia Consumer Spending Won’t Come to Rescue - WSJ

author: Jake Maxwell Watts
title: Asia Consumer Spending Won’t Come to Rescue
text:
SINGAPORE—Global economies roiled by slipping growth and a market rout rippling out from China aren't about to be saved by a boost in consumer spending from Asia, where household consumption is rapidly slipping away as one of the region’s last strong growth drivers.
As household debt rises and economic growth slows in many countries, as it has done for well over a year, consumption is also falling. Currencies have plummeted in value,...
